import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import { RiMap2Line, RiCalendarLine, RiBookLine, RiBarChartLine, RiSettings4Line, RiUser3Line, RiMenuLine, RiLogoutBoxRLine } from 'react-icons/ri'; import './Layout.css'; function Layout({ children }) { const [isSidebarCollapsed, setIsSidebarCollapsed] = useState(false); const navigate = useNavigate(); // Get user name from localStorage let userName = 'Traveler'; try { const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')); if (user && user.name) userName = user.name; } catch {} const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.clear(); navigate('/login'); }; return (
